Factories

Class ViewFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • Factories.ViewFactory

  • public class ViewFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing the Factory to create the view.
    Author:
    Afraz Salim

      • getInstance

      • createDiagramView

        public DiagramView createDiagramView(View view,
                                     Interaction interaction,
                                     int x,
                                     int y,
                                     int width,
                                     int height)
        A function to create the new diagram.
        Parameters:
        view - The given view with which the diagram will be created.
        interaction - The given controller for the new diagram.
        x - The given x-coordinate of the diagram.
        y - The given y-coordinate of the diagram.
        width - The given width of the diagram.
        height - The given height of the diagram.
        Returns:
        Return the new diagram.
        Throws:
        IllegalOperationExcetion - Throws the IllegalOperationExcetion if the view is not supported.
